es.prodevelop.cit.gvsig.jdbc_spatial
Class UtilityFileDataSourceAdapter

java.lang.Object
  com.hardcode.gdbms.engine.data.DataSourceCommonImpl
      com.hardcode.gdbms.engine.data.AbstractDataSource
          com.hardcode.gdbms.engine.data.file.AbstractFileDataSource
              es.prodevelop.cit.gvsig.jdbc_spatial.UtilityFileDataSourceAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.hardcode.gdbms.engine.data.DataSource, com.hardcode.gdbms.engine.data.driver.ReadAccess, com.hardcode.gdbms.engine.data.file.FileDataSource
public class UtilityFileDataSourceAdapter
extends com.hardcode.gdbms.engine.data.file.AbstractFileDataSource
implements com.hardcode.gdbms.engine.data.file.FileDataSource

This class is a simple FileDataSource adapter used to create a data source based on a DBF file which contains the oracle <--> epsg codes.

Author:
jldominguez
